exceptions.tactic: intros v u l2 l1 H1 H2 H3.
intros v' u l2 l1 H1 H2 H3.
intros v' u' l2 l1 H1 H2 H3.
intros v' u' l2' l1 H1 H2 H3.
intros v' u' l2' l1' H1 H2 H3.

original: intros v u l2 l1 H1 H2 H3. unfold is_lim_seq in H2. unfold is_lim_seq in H3. unfold Rbar_le. intros epsilon. specialize H2 with epsilon. specialize H3 with epsilon. destruct H2 as [N1 H2]. destruct H3 as [N2 H3]. pose (N := max N1 N2). exists N. intros n Hn. apply Rle_trans with (u n). - apply H1. apply Hn. - apply Rle_trans with (v n). + apply H2. lia. + apply H3. lia.
